content: अनुरोधः --धनं {@--1@} Compliance, gratification, fulfilling one's wishes &c. {@--2@} Conformity, accordance, obedience, regard, consideration; धर्मानुरोधात् <ls>K. 160</ls>, <ls n="K.">180</ls>, <ls n="K.">192</ls>; अत्र नानुरोधं तर्कये <ls>Mv. 7</ls> pleasure or gratification; आधारानुरोधात् <ls>Mu. 1. 2</ls> out of regard for; कविश्रमानुरोधाद्वा <ls>Ve. 1</ls> in consideration of; <ls>Mv. 5</ls>, <ls n="Mv.">3. 28</ls>; तदनुरोधात् --धेन accordingly, in accordance with it; वदेद्विपश्चिन्महतोनुरोधात् <ls>Pt. 1. 100</ls> after great consideration; humouring <ls>H. 2. 103</ls>; reference (of a rule.) {@--3@} Pressing, urging, coaxing; entreaty, solicitation, request; क इवात्रानुरोधः <ls>K. 209</ls>; तदनुरोधात् <ls n="K.">135</ls>; विनानुरोधात्स्वहितेच्छयैव <ls>Śi. 20. 81.</ls> {@--4@} Bearing of a rule.
